moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 e6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 a6: ? White can play Bf3 and black has no time for d6.  Black can play Nc6 or d6 here.
moves.19. exd5 Nxd5 20. Nxd5 Bxd5 21. Qe3 Bxg2: Black can also grab the pawn and after Nd4 play Rc7 protecting the bishop twice.
? cxd4 and the draw is assured.
Black wishes to remove the f3 pawn and leave White in zugzwang.
moves.42. h4 f5: ?? Black must leave moves in reserve to create the zugzwang.  42. gxh4 wins.
